bottlenecks: AVX-512 not available - limited to AVX2 (2x potential speedup lost)
Intel NPU not being utilized (10x AI acceleration potential)
io_uring async I/O not being utilized (3x I/O speedup potential)
Phase 3 async pipeline not integrated (10x orchestration speedup lost)
Small test files limit vectorization efficiency
Sequential processing not utilizing all 6 P-cores effectively

optimizations.name: AVX-512 Vectorization Upgrade
optimizations.description: Upgrade Shadowgit from AVX2 to AVX-512 when hardware supports it
optimizations.implementation: Modify shadowgit_avx2_diff.c to use 512-bit vector operations

optimizations.name: Intel NPU AI Acceleration
optimizations.description: Implement AI-assisted diff pattern recognition using Intel NPU
optimizations.implementation: Create OpenVINO model for diff pattern prediction and line similarity

optimizations.name: Async I/O with io_uring
optimizations.description: Replace synchronous file I/O with async io_uring operations
optimizations.implementation: Integrate io_uring for file reading in parallel with processing

optimizations.name: Multi-core Parallel Processing
optimizations.description: Process multiple diffs in parallel across P-cores
optimizations.implementation: Implement work-stealing queue with P-core affinity

optimizations.name: Memory Pool Optimization
optimizations.description: Use memory pools to reduce allocation overhead
optimizations.implementation: Pre-allocate aligned memory pools for diff operations

recommendations: CRITICAL: Fix baseline performance regression - should match AVX2 performance
1. IMMEDIATE: Implement parallel processing across all 6 P-cores
2. IMMEDIATE: Use memory pools to reduce allocation overhead
3. IMMEDIATE: Increase test file sizes to improve vectorization efficiency
4. SHORT-TERM: Integrate io_uring async I/O for 3x I/O speedup
5. SHORT-TERM: Enable Phase 3 async pipeline integration
6. SHORT-TERM: Implement work-stealing queue for better load balancing
7. LONG-TERM: Develop Intel NPU AI-assisted diff recognition (10x potential)
8. LONG-TERM: Prepare AVX-512 upgrade path for future hardware
9. LONG-TERM: Implement streaming diff for very large files
